playername.title: Enter Your Name
playername.description1: Type in both your first and last name to enter the game.
playername.description2: This will be used to identify you only during the game, and will not be stored.

howtoplay.title: How to Play!
howtoplay.slide1: Gain points by choosing the correct answer...
howtoplay.slide3: Gain more points by guessing the most popular incorrect answer!
